segments.text: Welcome to Game World . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to get a good RPG . Can you recommend any ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . This one here just came out . It's got great 3D graphics and a cool story line . It's also got a multiplayer function so you can play against other people on the Internet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This one looks pretty good , but I'd like to see more before I make up my mind . Do you have any other suggestions ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This one is also really cool . It's a sci-fi game in which you have to stop an alien invasion . The graphics on this one are spectacular .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm , it's a tough choice , but I think I'll go with this one .
segments.speaker: S2
